import { Button, FormLabel , Typography,TextField,Box, Checkbox} from '@mui/material'; import React from 'react'; const labelProps ={ mt:1, mb:1, } const AddMovie = () => { const [inputs, setInputs] = use return (
Add New Movie < FormLabel sx={labelProps}>Title < FormLabel sx={labelProps}>Description < FormLabel sx={labelProps}>Poster URL < FormLabel sx={labelProps}>Release Date < FormLabel sx={labelProps}>Actor < FormLabel sx={labelProps}>Featured
) } export default AddMovie
